response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. After careful consideration and analysis of its unique features and benefits, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Our initial offer for this exceptional product is set at $18,000. We understand that each buyer's valuation might differ, and we are open to discussing this further to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 18000}
